alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 6:29AM EST until March 08 at 5:26AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry affecting Stark County. For the Nimishillen Creek...including North Industry...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry. * WHEN...From this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water backs up into a mobile home park on Cleveland Southwest Avenue in Canton Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 11.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.5 feet on 06/15/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 430 PM EST.
